Description:
Recipe Development: Develop unique and delicious cookie recipes that cater to various tastes, dietary preferences, and seasonal themes.
Baking and Production: Oversee the baking and production of cookies, ensuring consistent quality and timely delivery to meet customer demands.
Cookie Design and Decoration: Utilize your artistic flair to decorate cookies with precision and creativity, making them visually appealing and Instagram-worthy.
Quality Control: Maintain high standards of quality in ingredients, preparation, and presentation to deliver the best cookies to customers.
Inventory Management: Monitor and manage cookie ingredients and supplies to ensure a well-stocked and efficient production process.
Team Collaboration: Work closely with other team members, including pastry chefs, bakers, and kitchen staff, to create a harmonious and productive work environment.
Menu Planning: Collaborate with the culinary team to contribute cookie ideas for our seasonal and regular menu offerings.Skills
Skills:
Culinary Expertise: Extensive experience and expertise in baking, particularly in crafting a wide variety of cookies, is essential.
Creativity: Demonstrated ability to innovate and create unique cookie flavors and designs that capture the attention of customers.
Attention to Detail: Meticulous when it comes to measuring ingredients, following recipes, and decorating cookies with precision and finesse.
Time Management: Efficiently manage time and prioritize tasks to meet production schedules and deadlines.
Knowledge of Ingredients: Familiarity with a diverse range of baking ingredients, including their properties, substitutions, and interactions.
Aesthetic Sense: Strong eye for aesthetics and presentation, ensuring that each cookie is visually appealing and aesthetically pleasing.
Adaptability: Ability to adapt to changing customer preferences and seasonal demands, adjusting cookie offerings accordingly.
